function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of evidence for SARS-CoV-2 removal by portable air filtration devices","Impact":"Ineffective control of SARS-CoV-2 transmission through air","Mitigation":"Conduct further studies to test the effectiveness of portable air filtration devices for SARS-CoV-2 removal","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration technologies with proven efficacy against SARS-CoV-2","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and individuals in indoor environments","Owner":"Researchers, public health authorities, and air filtration manufacturers"},{"Description":"Uncertain optimal air changes required to remove detectable pathogens","Impact":"Limited ability to control the spread of detectable pathogens through air","Mitigation":"Conduct research to define the optimal air changes required for pathogen removal","Technologies":"Air monitoring and sampling technologies, computational fluid dynamics simulations","People":"Healthcare facility managers, building owners, and indoor environment stakeholders","Owner":"Researchers, air quality experts, and facility management professionals"},{"Description":"Potential artefactual reduction in the viability of sampled virus by air sampling devices","Impact":"Reduced accuracy in assessing the viability of sampled virus in air","Mitigation":"Implement multiple validation methods for assessing the viability of sampled virus","Technologies":"Validation assays, comparison with known standards, and calibration of air sampling devices","People":"Laboratory technicians, researchers, and public health authorities","Owner":"Laboratory quality assurance teams, research institutions, and public health agencies"}]}
